column1: We don't rise to the level of our expectations, we fall to the level of our training.
The secret is to show up, do the work, and go home. A blue collar work ethic married to indomitable will. It is literally that simple.
Slow is smooth, smooth is fast.
If [more] information was the answer then we'd all be billionaires with perfect abs.
Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
Writing a novel [or learning] is like driving at night in the fog. You can see only as far as your headlights, but you can make the whole trip that way.
He who doesn't know foreign languages knows nothing of his own.
It's not because things are difficult that we dare not venture. It's because we dare not venture that they are difficult.
How you do anything is how you will do everything.
Even if you fail at your ambitious thing, it's very hard to fail completely. That's the thing that people don't get.
I work for myself. So when it seems like I'm being self-deprecating, I'm actually sticking it to the man.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
Define success on your own terms, achieve it by your own rules, and build a life you're proud to live.
A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.

I will persist until I succeed. Always will I take another step. If that is of no avail I will take another, and yet another. In truth, one step at a time is not too difficult. I know that small attempts, repeated, will complete any undertaking.
You want to change your life fast? Then trade your expectation for appreciation; you'll have a whole new life.
The struggle ends when the gratitude begins.
Emptiness is the fasting of the mind.
Find the thing in you that is different, that's as sharp as a diamond and jagged as a razor. Hone that, because that's the thing with which you'll cut the world.
The acquisition of riches has been for many men, not an end, but a change, of troubles.
It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
Habit is the intersection of knowledge (what to do), skill (how to do), and desire (want to do).
Sow a thought, reap an action; sow an action, reap a habit; sow a habit, reap a character; sow a character, reap a destiny.
If you're the smartest person in the room, you're in the wrong room.
Have no fear of perfection, you'll never reach it.
Everything can be taken from a man but one thing, the last of the human freedoms -- to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.
External things are not the problem. It's your assessment of them. Which you can erase right now.
It's better to be prolific than perfect.
The amount of energy necessary to refute bullshit is an order of magnitude bigger than to produce it.
The best is the enemy of the good
Don't let your imagination be crushed by life as a whole.
Well-being is realized by small steps, but is truly no small thing
Life without a design is erratic
If you seek tranquility, do less. Whic brings a double satisfaction: to do less, better
You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think
Keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best
Each day, acquire something that will fortify you against poverty, against death, indeed against other misfortunes, as well
Concentrate every minute, on doing what's in front of you with precise and genuine seriousness, tenderly, willingly, with justice.
Putting things off and always deferring the day after which you will attend to yourself, you will live and die as someone quite ordinary
Only the disciplined ones in life are free. If you are undisciplined, you are a slave to your moods and your passions.
Information is abundant, it's the desire to learn that's scarce.
Attention, taken to its highest degree, is the same thing as prayer. It presupposes faith and love. Then is the lack of attention the opposite? Does it presuppose fear and hate?
All of humanity's problems stem from man's inability to sit quietly in a room alone.
Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.

Anti-intellectualism has been a constant thread winding its way through our political and cultural life, nurtured by the false notion that democracy means that 'my ignorance is just as good as your knowledge'.
Champions keep playing until they get it right.
Birthdays cause a man to reflect on what little he has accomplished.
The first rule of science is that you do not fool yourself, and you are the easiest person to fool.
Talent hits a target no one else can hit; genius hits a target no one else can see.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
The greatest unsolved mysteries are the mysteries of our existence as conscious beings in a small corner of a vast universe
The world will ask who you are, and if you do not know, the world will tell you.
There are no solutions. There are only trade-offs.
What I cannot create, I do not understand
If you don't find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die.
The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.
In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
Sometimes, magic is just someone spending more time on something than anyone else might reasonably expect.
Few people are capable of expressing with equanimity opinions which differ from the prejudices of their social environment. Most people are even incapable of forming such opinions.
All buildings are predictions. All predictions are wrong.
It's easier to win an argument with a genius than an idiot.
We are the masters of the unsaid words, but slaves of those we let slip out.
A man who procrastinates in his choosing will inevitably have his choice made for him by circumstance.
Writing is thinking. To write well is to think clearly. That's why it's so hard.
Truth is not what you want it to be; it is what it is, and you must bend to its power or live a lie.
When people show you who they are, believe them.
Life is either daring adventure or nothing at all.
Buy the ticket take the ride.
You only live once but if you do it right once is enough.
Above All, try something.
I never worry about the future it comes soon enough.
One who makes no mistakes makes nothing at all.
Do one thing everyday that scares you.
In the end it's not the years in your life that count it's the life in your years.
If I'd followed all the rules, I'd never have gotten anywhere.
Action expresses priorities.
